messages.subject: Contact Info for Gordon Robinson?
messages.msgSnippet: List, Could someone put me in touch with Gordon Robinson? Please send me his email off list, or Gordon can you drop me a line ASAP. I seem t have misplaced his
messages.messageBody:
List,

Could someone put me in touch with Gordon Robinson?
Please send me his email off list, or Gordon can you
drop me a line ASAP. I seem t have misplaced his
email.

Thank you,

Curran Campbell
